headline: RTX's Raytheon launches new Coyote variant from helicopter
summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, fired a new version of the company's combat-proven Coyote® family of products from a helicopter during a recent test at Nine Mile Training Center, giving military forces a new capability to detect, identify, locate and defeat threats on the battlefield.

headline: RTX's Raytheon receives follow-on contract from U.S. Army for advanced defense analysis solution
summary: ARLINGTON, Va. - Raytheon, an RTX business, has been awarded a follow-on contract from the U.S. Army Futures Command, Futures and Concepts Center to continue to utilize its Rapid Campaign Analysis...
